articles.title: Serena and Venus Williams knocked out of US Open doubles by Lucie Hradecka and Linda Noskova
articles.description: Venus and Serena Williams were unable to rediscover their signature magic and lost to Lucie Hradecka and Linda Noskova 7-6 (5), 6-4 in the first round of the US Open doubles on Thursday night.

articles.title: Injured UConn women's basketball star Paige Bueckers to bypass early WNBA Draft entry, return to Huskies for 2023-24 season
articles.description: UConn women's basketball star Paige Bueckers said Thursday that while she will be age-eligible to declare for the 2023 WNBA draft, she will return to UConn for the 2023-24 season despite being sidelined this upcoming season with an ACL injury.
